sentences.text: Good afternoon! Can I help you?
Hi! Yes, I’m looking for a dress to wear to a wedding.
Could you please tell me where the dresses are?
The dresses are over there, next to the mirrors.
Feel free to try anything on.
Thanks! I’ve picked out a few dresses.
This red one is too small — could you bring me one in a larger size?
Of course. What size do you need?
A size 12, please. And this blue one is a bit loose — can I try a smaller one?
No problem, I’ll be right back with both sizes.
— A few minutes later —
Great! I’ll take the red one — it fits perfectly.
Wonderful choice! Please come to the counter to pay.
I’ll pay by card.
I’m sorry, but our card machine isn’t working right now.
You’ll need to withdraw some cash from the ATM.
Oh, okay. Where’s the nearest ATM?
It’s about ten minutes from here, next to the post office.
Got it! I’ll be back soon with the cash.
No problem! I’ll keep your dress at the counter.
